issue.title: door valve and hinge friction range

content.raw:
I've updated the [tutorial](#!/osrf/srcsim/wiki/finals_task3) with the friction ranges, but as a reference here they are:

Joint | Min friction | Max friction | Min damping | Max damping
----- | ------------ | ------------ | ----------- | ----------- 
Valve | 1.0 | 1.6 | 0.01 | 0.05
Door hinge | 10.0 | 20.0 | 1.0 | 4.0

I'll add a note to this issue in case these ranges are changed at some point.
content.html:
I've updated the tutorial with the friction ranges, but as a reference here they are:

Joint Min friction Max friction Min damping Max damping
Valve 1.0 1.6 0.01 0.05
Door hinge 10.0 20.0 1.0 4.0

I'll add a note to this issue in case these ranges are changed at some point.
